title: Game-Based Collaborative Design Learning for Data Literacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary data analysis skills and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing the cultivation of data-driven decision-making skills for working professionals in non-formal educational settings.

learning_goals: Learners can apply data collection, interpretation, and visualization techniques in game design processes using real-world data
Learners can explain data literacy concepts to peers through collaborative learning
Learners can present data-driven problem-solving strategies through game-based project outcomes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
